Mars Wrigley Confectionary is looking for Associate Scientist, Quality Management Processes in Hackettstown, NJ. The Associate Scientist BU QMP position provides functional leadership to develop, implement, maintain, and proactively improve quality management systems. The role is primarily responsible for management and implementation of the MARS Quality Management Process (QMP) at the business unit level.  This role is a key part of the Quality & Food Safety team. Much of the delivery of the role needs to be achieved through others. It is therefore essential that the job holder is able to effectively work with the corporate, global, regional, and local Quality & Food Safety teams and all functions that impact Quality across the business as necessary to develop, maintain and improve the segment QMP and Quality & Food Safety governance. Key Responsibilities:Create and coordinate metrics inputs to the business unit quality assurance management review process by data trending/data analyticsContinuously improve primary elements of the quality management system such as: document control, management review, and corrective and preventative actionProvide training and development support for key users and end users of the systems across the business unitDrive and prioritize continuous improvement for implemented systemsMinimum Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Food Science or related science3 years of relevant experience in food or related industryMicrosoft Office proficientStrong Problem Solving abilityData reporting formats and frequenciesAbility to travel up to 30% of the timeSuccessful Completion of a drug and background screenPreferred Qualifications:Advanced degree in Food Science or related science4+ years of relevant experience in food or related industryProven application of quality tools, laboratory methods, food science, and/or statisticsStrong organizational skillsDemonstrated ability to successfully handle multiple projects and programsExperience in auditing Company paid relocation is not available for this role.
